item.title: Meghan add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
item.description: "What would you do if I kissed you right now?" I stared at his beautiful face and his beautiful mouth and I wanted nothing more than to taste it. "I would kiss you back." -- Michelle Hodkin

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
Meghan add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
item.description: "I laughed as I twisted to face him and raised my arm to hit in one move. He caught my wrist and my laugh caught in my throat. A mischievous grin curved my mouth as I raised my other hand to hit him. He reached over me and caught that wrist too, gently pinning my arms above my head as he straddled my hips. The space between us boiled my blood." -- Michelle Hodkin

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
item.description: "I was warned about you, you know." And with that half-smile that wrecked me, Noah said, "But you're here anyway." -- Michelle Hodkin

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
